Overall, the summary must weave together these interconnected threads into a coherent, multi-layered account of the user's comprehensive baking journey and event management.

summarization.question: Can you summarize how my baking goals, techniques, and challenges have developed over time based on our conversations?
summarization.ideal_summary: Over the course of our discussions, your baking journey has progressed through several stages. Initially, you set an ambitious goal to master bread, pastries, and desserts by April 2024, committing to baking at least three times a week with a structured plan that gradually increased in complexity. You then refined this plan by incorporating a detailed weekly and monthly schedule, balancing different types of baked goods to ensure steady skill development. Alongside skill-building, you focused on improving specific technical aspects, such as achieving precise measuring accuracy within ±1 gram by February 2024 through daily practice and calibration. You also experimented with ingredient adjustments, like optimizing oil types for cake moistness and enhancing sourdough flavor and texture by adding malt powder and other ingredients. Throughout, you addressed practical challenges, including kitchen organization strategies to separate vegan and non-vegan ingredients and scheduling baking lessons around fixed weekly commitments. This evolving approach reflects a comprehensive and adaptive baking practice that integrates goal-setting, technical skill improvement, ingredient experimentation, and logistical planning.
